Lucille Malkia Roberts (1927-2004) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe.

A mụrụ ya na Washington, D.C., Roberts nwetara nzèrè bachelọ ya na Mahadum Howard na nzèrè Master of Fine Arts na Mahadim Michigan. Roberts kụziri màkà ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze DC n'oge niile ọ na-arụ ọrụ, gụnyere Duke Ellington School for the Arts na Shaw Junior High School, ebe ọ kụziri n'akụkụ Alma Thomas ruo ọtụtụ afọ. Ọ bụ prọfesọ nke nka na akụkọ ihe méré eme na DC Teachers College, State University of New York na Oswego, Washington Technical Institute na American University. Ọ gàrà ọtụtụ ébé n'oge ọrụ ya, mana ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya sitere na isiokwu na isiokwu ndị Afrịka. Roberts mụkwara akwụkwọ na Hale Woodruff ma kụzie na Mahadum Howard site na 1976 ruo 1985. O gosipụtara n'ọtụtụ ebe, a na-egosikwa ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta onwé na nke ọha.
